thread.title: New Blink-182 Music Coming In April, Mark Hoppus Says [News]
thread.title_full: New Blink-182 Music Coming In April, Mark Hoppus Says [News]

title: New Blink-182 Music Coming In April, Mark Hoppus Says [News]
text:
New Blink-182 Music Coming in April, Mark Hoppus Says Mark Hoppus says and then deletes the tweet, that is. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 22 hours ago 2 
In a subsequently-deleted tweet, Blink-182 bassist Mark Hoppus said the band will be releasing new music in April. 
In a recent Twitter Q&A, the musician was asked by a fan "when are my headphones gonna be blaring new and beautiful music of yours? Cuz I need new songs to memorize," to which he replied (via Alt Press ): 
"I believe it's April now." 
Released in July 2016 as the band's first album in 5 years, the latest Blink record " California " is still pretty fresh, hence new music within just 9 months isn't something that most fans would consider likely. Anyhow, stay tuned for updates.
